org.apache.solr.analytics.statistics

Class NumericStatsCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.analytics.statistics.MinMaxStatsCollector
      • org.apache.solr.analytics.statistics.NumericStatsCollector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatsCollector

    public class NumericStatsCollector
extends MinMaxStatsCollector
    NumericStatsCollector computes the sum, sum of squares, mean and standard deviation.
